scripts.start: concurrently "npm run build --prefix client/root" "npm run build --prefix client/projects/calculator" "npm run build --prefix client/projects/dragndrop" "npm run build --prefix client/projects/pokemonwar" "npm run build --prefix client/projects/emailrater" "nodemon index.js"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: concurrently "npm i --prefix=client/projects/emailrater" "npm i --prefix=client/projects/pokemonwar" "npm i --prefix=client/projects/calculator" "npm i --prefix=client/root" "npm i --prefix=client/projects/dragndrop" && concurrently "npm run build --prefix=client/projects/emailrater"  "npm run build --prefix=client/root"  "npm run build --prefix=client/projects/calculator"  "npm run build --prefix=client/projects/dragndrop" "npm run build --prefix=client/projects/pokemonwar"
